attributes.action: UK Licence to Practice for Electricians
attributes.additional_details:
Sign this petition if you want the government to create a simple licensing scheme for the UK Electrical Industry that would improve the current part P system, weed out cowboys, improve safety and increase pay levels.
The licensing scheme would show levels of competency and Knowledge within set key areas: Domestic, commercial & industrial.
The licence will allow the holder to practise and or trade at that level.
